TopicTitle: Every failure should be accounted for and not be erased from the log

Articles.Content:
With the power available to computers today the game needs much better accountability for part damage.  I should know when the failure occured, where it occured, and what the stress forces involved were at a minimum.  This information should never be unaccounted for or erased from the log in any way.  Amen.

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
